name: The National Advisory Council to the Thalidomide Trust
legal: None - user led advisory body to a disability organisation, the Thalidomide Trust. The Thalidomide Trust is a Trust under British law registered charity no. 266220 held on 4 th July 2008 at 16 Old Bailey
goal:
The National Advisory Council (NAC) to the Thalidomide Trust is a user led advisory body to a disability organisation. It conforms to the concept of user led and empowered participation in decision making processes of a disability organisation.

The NAC also advocates on the national UK and European level the plight of Thalidomide survivors and to achieve appropriate financial compensation and recognition of their plight.
euInitiatives: Public health, research and innovation, active and healthy ageing, civil rights
